channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 3rd December
item.description:
A haulage truck filled with soil and tarmac has been left outside our property for two days. The front passenger window is smashed we believe it’s been abandoned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellhouse Road, Eden Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: By the parade, 3rd December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Plaistow Lane, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very overgrown weeds, 3rd December
item.description:
Please can you remove the weeds all along the grass verge along Evergreen Close. They haven’t been cut for months and just grow back really quickly. Can something be done to remove them completely please and return the verge to grass (or even better - flowers!!) The tall weeds attract litter dumping and fly tipping as well as endless dog fouling. Children live in this close and have to walk along the verge to safely get to their houses. Please take action!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evergreen Close, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves need sweeping, 3rd December
item.description:
The paths need sweeping leaves so wet its slippery and dangerous to use the path
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Station Crescent, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole prior to Paddington turnoff on the Westway, 3rd December
item.description:
Large pothole prior to Paddington turn off on the Westway heading east, middle lane I think. Highly dangerous if a motorcycle hits it at night. I noticed a second large pothole after the Paddington turnoff again on the Westway, equally as dangerous for motorcycles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westway, Bayswater, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Part repair work left open, 3rd December
item.description:
The path outside number 4-8 Stelling road is being repaired after my child fell off her scooter due to a large crack. They have dug up the damaged path which is 3 houses long but have left it with no fence to cover it or sign. I have just twisted my ankle falling off it whilst putting the bins out, and because of the bins there is very little room for people to pass by without falling and hurting their ankle aswell.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stelling Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Scrap Business Being Run From Private Land, 3rd December
item.description:
This person is known as Sami Ali on Facebook 07732088499/HX04 KZT. He advertises vehicles to be scrapped but they are kept on private land and are grouped together. He removes the number plates and covers the VIN numbers. With recent scrap yard fires at Abbey Breakers and on Slade Green Industrial Estate it’s clear this is a significant fire risk to the adjacent residential buildings.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cornwallis Close, Slade Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dump Chair, broken mirror and abandoned bins, 3rd December
item.description:
There are multiple abandoned bins that have been in this location for over 3 weeks. There is also a dumped chair and broken mirror. Please kindly remove the abandoned items. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Love Walk, Camberwell, Greater London
